column4: i keep getting errors and ignores when doing apt-get update, what is going wrong? D:
what errors?
it says "ign" infront of the repository line, and gives 404s
even though the repository is working and so is my internet
are those ign on official repositories?
yes
try changing your server in Software Sources
i did that already, it didnt help
what version of Ubuntu?
Karmic on the Arm architecture
are those for Translation?>
Not really, i took it from the normal wiki
at the end og the ign line it should tell you what section of the repos
of*
all of them pretty much fail to load
i get no packages available at all
hmm can you pastebin your sources.list please
yes one moment
pastebin.com/hXk2Gues
cz is a czech repo correct? if you change it to main does it give same errors?
I tried US, CZ and german already, but i think im onto the problem: I need to use the ubuntu ports repository, not the normal one i think
I don't know what the ports repository is but you seem to have figured something out :)
it seems to be some special repo for those ubuntu ports to other processor architectures, thanks for the help :D
ahh ok, you did mention ARM
